Text: Winstar Wireless Cc Mark I left you a message on Friday regarding the Riser Agreement that the Enron Networks business folks are anxious to put into place I understand that you will be out of town until Wednesday Is there anyone else on your staff that I could work with to get this fairly simple document reviewed and approved Many thanks Susan Bulgawicz Senior Counsel EB M FAX

Global Strategic SourcingYou did such a fine job volunteering for Enron Networks I thought I would try again Do you know who the general counsel is that supports GSS I know that there is an attorney who supports them but who is the general counsel Thanks Susan Bulgawicz Senior Counsel EB M FAX

Metromedia Fiber Network MFN Cc legal At your request the following is a summary of the issues related to the notice of lien that we have received from Fisk Electric Smith Street Land Company gave MFN a license to access Enron Center South for the purpose of installing telecommunication capabilities to and in that building My assumption in preparing the License Agreement was that there would be a business contract between Enron Networks and MFN covering such its as pricing specific services payment obligations and a prohibition against placing liens on the property Had I known that there would be no such business contract I would have included the lien language in the License Agreement Because of this lien issue between MFN and Fisk all of our existing License Agreements including the MFN License Agreement are being amended to add the lien language Fisk has sent us a notice of lien claiming nonpayment from MFN in the amount of This document is not and does not create a lien but rather just sets up the statutory requirements for a lien to be file in case MFN does not pay If a lien is filed several negative things happen from our perspective First there will be a cloud on the title of the property which will effect our ability to roll the building into a structured financing vehicle as is planned in the future Second because our property has been enhanced by the work that Fisk did we may become responsible for payment of the full amount to Fisk plus their other related expenses Obviously we want the lien issue corrected immediately and should put whatever pressure is necessary in order to get the issue resolved If you need further information give me a call Susan Bulgawicz Senior Counsel EB M FAX
